title: WARNING: DONT WATCH IF YOU ARE ADDICTED TO FARM EQUIPMENT!

tasks.task: Attend the National Farm Machinery Show and explore various agricultural equipment.
subtasks: Navigating through different booths and aisles.
Examine the features and specifications of tractors (e.g., horsepower, pivot-steer, SCR emissions).
Inspect implements such as mowers, tillers, and flail cutters.
Evaluate hydraulic systems and attachments compatibility.
Inquire about pricing and dealer/distribution networks.
Take notes on new products or manufacturers for potential collaboration.
Collaborate with distributors and reps to expand product lineup.
Seek out competitors' booths (e.g., grace manufacturing, voltra) for market analysis.
Stay updated on industry trends and equipment advancements.
Participate in meet-and-greets and connect with other attendees, including YouTubers.
Film a video tour to showcase the experience and share insights with viewers.
